titleStmt.title: A vindication of St. Gregorie his dialogues: in which the great St. Gregory is proved the author of that work.
titleStmt.author: Mumford, J. (James), 1606-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Crooke, at the Ship in St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Leaf A2 is incorrectly signed A3.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
